website_summaries.verdict: This small, lightweight case keeps your top 10 favorite games snapped securely in place.
pros: Thin case allows for a high level of portability and the games fit snugly inside
Also has slots for memory cards and mini SD cards
cons: Plastic hinges are a little flimsy and you'll need to buy a few extra if you want to travel with a large library of games

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money I bought, since I fill the games I have. Also, I took out the holder for the memory cards, and it comes with just the two holders for just the memory cards if you have like three or four for other games. But it holds up to holding 10 games in total and it’s slim in size. And you can tell by the other size vita carrying case that I have.
customer_reviews.author: Fan reader

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy
customer_reviews.text: I like this case. With a preference for cartridge games over digital you need a place to keep them. I have two of these cases, one is the official Sony case, and this one is the better of the two. The slots are a nice tight fit for your games, the case is sturdy and the clasp is firm. It also has some space for additional memory cards. It's about all you need. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: mr dead

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and thin!
customer_reviews.text: Look at the photos on the other reviews. This will not be the same color as advertised. It's REALLY dark blue. They say it's translucent but barely because of how dark it actually is. It's really nice since it's super thin and small and will hold 10 vita game cards OR 8 vita game cards and 4 microSD cards OR 9 vita game cards and 2 microSD cards. The microSD slots are removable and pretty cool. You can refit those into any other vita game case to store your microSD since they're shaped the same as any other vita game card.
customer_reviews.author: AoiMizuno

customer_reviews.title: Simple and very portable
customer_reviews.text: I needed a case to hold all my vita cartridges and sony's case seemed a bit expensive. I decided to use nyko's case and it was perfect. It can hold all my cartridges securely and even has 2 spaces for an extra memory cards. It was a little hard to open at first but don't be afraid to use a bit of force! It also fit in the pouch of my Eva case with my vita inside. I can take all my games with me on the go no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Lim

customer_reviews.title: Not transparent
customer_reviews.text: had to give this three stars because the function of the case is just fine. However, I was irritated that I specifically ordered this because the picture and description describe this as being a transparent blue, which I wanted so I could see my games. Well the case is a very DARK blue, not the light blue pictured, and while you can see some color through the case, you won't be easily seeing what's inside without opening it.
customer_reviews.author: Lnsy

customer_reviews.title: Best and cheap price to boot
customer_reviews.text: This can hold up to 10 games and is small enough to easily fit in your pocket with your vita. I have mine set up to hold 9 games and 2 memory cards(it comes with a attachment that slides into a game holder to hold 2 memory cards instead). Other cases are bulky and more expensive this one will better suit you if you going to carry them in your pocket. Also like to mention that its a sturdy case without being "heavy duty" and bulky like seemingly all other vita game cases on top of being the best for my needs it was the cheapest as well wen i bought mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good 4-star case for your Vita games and memory cards
customer_reviews.text: A co-worker had recommended this to me as a safe way to store Vita games and memory cards. The case I have has a few built-in felt slots but the games and cards tend to fall out easily. I'm impressed. The plastic seems pretty heavy duty and the games and memory cards snap into place nicely. In fact, this case easily fits INSIDE my other one, so it's a double-win. For $5, it's a good deal and a good solution. Strong 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Craig L.

customer_reviews.title: Go higher quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very basic case, and so you can't get mad at it for being low quality. Games can sometimes be difficult to pull out, but then again, I had a moment when all the games on a side dropped out when I was trying to get 1 game out. You need to pay attention to whether or not it's closed properly, because the seam where the 2 sides come together sometimes overlaps on the wrong side of the case, and this may result in damage to the case, or lost games (due to falling out) if you're not paying attention.
customer_reviews.author: Capt.Kira

customer_reviews.title: Kids will break this
customer_reviews.text: Fits games and memory cards very well but heavy use will put an end to this game case. Kids already broke the tiny plastic pieces that keep the game secured in place. So we went from being able to hold 8 games to about 4. Kids might break it even more by the time I finish this review. They ain't getting another one I can tell you that. Enjoy but use with care.
customer_reviews.author: BloodAgentTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Slide don't click.
customer_reviews.text: Slim game case. Fits in the travel pouch great. The memeory card holding part of this case is a little misleading. When you first open it it looks to be that you can click in the memory cards, not the case, you have to slide from either end to have the memory cards stay. Do not try clicking them in it will break the piece that holds them in place.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and one of the smaller option.
customer_reviews.text: This game case has held up rather well thus far. The case itself is fairly durable feels sturdy in hand when closed. It does use an alignment system that when slightly off feels like you might break the case. I have yet to have a true problem with it and it has worked well thus far. I do wish that it had only come with one Vita memory card holder but that was not hard to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Good case to hold the games but I feel like It might break.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel case
customer_reviews.text: I used this to pack my Vita games for a flight. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great game case for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This case holds several games and memory cards. The memory card slots can be removed to allow for more space to store games. I feel like my games are very secure in this case. The whole thing is plastic and it feels like it could break apart, but I've had the case for about a year now and have used it heavily without any damage occurring. This case also fits into the case I own for my Vita, so that's a huge plus!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: I've gotten three of these cases at this point. ...
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten three of these cases at this point. It is my preferred case for holding Vita games, as the slim design is practical for transport and storage, and it holds a lot of games!
customer_reviews.author: Sugarcube101

customer_reviews.title: What I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I like to buy used games from GameStop. Sometimes I don’t get a case so this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Wilpho

customer_reviews.title: Safe and secured game case
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a month now and it holds up very well. I've never had an issue and each game and memory card feel safe and secured inside. If you're in need for a case holder and protection for PS Vita games, then I recommend this case from Nyko. Thanks for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Mashuu

customer_reviews.title: Nyko Vita Game Case
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple, sturdy vita game case with no frills. It holds your games tightly and securely. I've had it about a year, and it's still in like new shape. The clasp hasn't broken and is still tight. I don't plan on buying a lot of physical copies of Vita games, since there is so much great digital stuff, but it is nice to have the space just in case. And for the price, this case hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Robozippy

customer_reviews.title: Great for a collection
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little case. It definitely fits 10 games and it's a huge bonus that it holds memory cards too. It's a small form factor is great for keeping in cases and it has very secure bondings to hold the games.
customer_reviews.author: Autty

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of my PS Vita game cards. I like this game box, it’s very sturdy and protects my game cards well!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Singer

customer_reviews.title: Great and compact and just overall amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this case holds all my games perfectly and comes with two extra inserts to hold 4 memory cards honestly great investment...I'll be buying another like literally right after this review haha I bought even more hard copy games 😂😂😂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portability
customer_reviews.text: A very convenient and portable way to store and carry Vita games safely.It has 10 slots which can fit 10 games, or 8 games and 2 memory cards. The memory cards fit inside of removable plastic pieces that fit in the game slots, so they are optional.
customer_reviews.author: Zach B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and defective.
customer_reviews.text: The games fall out of just two slots. While not a giant deal, it is very annoying to open the case and have a game just drop out. So I would recommend getting something that's a little better in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: I can keep my games in one place and not worry about losing them
customer_reviews.author: nobodyheart3

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality, doesn't feel cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great way to store your vita games. I load up a few games and pack this into my bag when I head out. Easier than lugging aroudn the original game case.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding Vita games
customer_reviews.text: Great for holding Vita games. Doesn't fall apart, and I can store at least three (comfortably) in my Butterfox Travel Case. Being able to take 40 games on the go is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: The useable space for the size of the case is superb.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. The plastic hinges are a little flimsy, but the useable space for the size of the case is superb. It is also priced low enough that if/when it does finally break, getting a replacement won't sting as bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: it dose its job
customer_reviews.text: It came a little late but alls well that ends well. It come in store packaging not all loose, wich was good. And it hold my games extremely well, had a little trouble opening the box but once you get it open you know you wont be loosing your games and extra memory sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: Very small and convenient case. As I have the Sony hard vault for my PA Vita I could only store 3 games inside of it. This new case allows me to store 10 additional games (the memory card storage slots can be removed to store 2 games instead - great feature!) The game cards are secure inside the case and easy to insert/remove. Well worth the purchase price. Case was a much darker blue than advertised which looks even better!
customer_reviews.author: Brian M. Jablonka

customer_reviews.title: useful, but it feels kinda flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It's serviceable for what I need. I needed some kind of case so I didn't have to carry the regular vita cases, and I wanted something so I wouldn't lose the cards themselves, either. Overall, useful, but it feels kinda flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M

customer_reviews.title: but I love having it
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I though it was going to be, but I love having it. And it's size makes it easy to slip into a pocket
customer_reviews.author: No Publicity

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case at a great price. I actually took out the inside of the case, the part that holds the games, from the snap case. I have a case for my Vita that has a pouch for games, but they are just loose. The part that holds the games fits perfectly into that pouch on my Vita case, and now may games don't fall around.
customer_reviews.author: HugoHoller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love how this makes all my games available in one place and its see through,
customer_reviews.author: crybaby2

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we needed to hold our children's Lego Dimensions Characters. All of them fit in well, even the larger pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very good choice for transporting your portable collection of games
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, perfectly sized and flexible case for Vita games. I like the fact you can choose if you want to carry memory cards or use their slots for games instead. Color of my case is dark blue, and not light blue like on the picture, so I cannot see easily which games are in the case. My only concern is if plastic latch will be sturdy enough after prolonged use.
customer_reviews.author: Igor K.

customer_reviews.title: Solid little case
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Keeps 10 games and fits nicely in my travel case with my vita so everything goes with me. Case feels solid and nowhere as cheap as it actually is. I would recommend to anyone looking for a decent case for games.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Boehl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Darker blue than I thought though. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Starr

customer_reviews.title: very nice simple product
customer_reviews.text: very nice simple product. Handles the job pretty well. It fits well in the Butterfox Double Compartment Carry Case which I also purchased from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: O. Itani

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fits all the Vita games perfectly do not move around stage right in place great for keeping track and not losing the little discs
customer_reviews.author: Shana M

customer_reviews.title: Best case for Vita games on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: In terms of price, size and amount of games it can hold, this is easily the best for storing your vita games. It is less than a 1/2 inch thick and costs around $7. There are 2 removable memory card trays otherwise it holds 10 games.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shiau

customer_reviews.title: It can hold alot of games and memory cards
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good at storage, its might be small, but it can hold a ton! I received this package quite fast as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ronaldo de ponte

customer_reviews.title: Great game case!
customer_reviews.text: Fits in my plastic shell Play-asia case, can definitely recommend to those that love carrying their physical games around.
customer_reviews.author: Arash

customer_reviews.title: Color not as described, otherwise great!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why but my case is much darker, like a navy blue, and it's easy to lose sight of because of it. However, it is durable and the games fit nicely in it.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy70

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Super slim, well put, ideal for the on the go player
customer_reviews.author: MauriciohzCom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Case is perfect for on the go gaming. Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Tal

customer_reviews.title: Great case and slim
customer_reviews.text: The case holds either (10) Vita games or (9) Vita games and (2) memory cards or (8) Vita games and (4) memory cards. The case is slim and fits in my Vita carrying case. I purchased it mainly for the memory card holders and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It's not crystal clear blue, it's more like a really dark blue but you can see through a little. Have to say this dark colour actually make it doesn't look so cheap. Highly suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I like the form factor of the case but the hinge ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the form factor of the case but the hinge on the inside broke in less than a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good for on the go
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Good for on the go. But if you can get a case that has a built in slots, go for that instead.
customer_reviews.author: jiru-rei-hachi

customer_reviews.title: it fit perfect on my carry bag
customer_reviews.text: it fit perfect on my carry bag, others products are bigger, this one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great lil case
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Which was a little bigger. Hard to keep up with.
customer_reviews.author: V. Eaves

customer_reviews.title: totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Holds 10 games or 8 games and 2 memory cards, fits inside most P'S Vita cases. I have 2 of these, they are awesome and you cannot beat the price. Cannot recommend this enough if you are building up your Vita collection.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small game case that would fit inside a Pelican 1050 case (with foam pre-cut for a Vita). This fit inside the case like it was made for it. The Pelican case I have is not the official one, but the $50 one available on E-Bay. If you keep your Vita in a case, this is probably a good buy for you as well. I got it for $5 with free Prime shipping which I consider to be a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy KingGillen

customer_reviews.title: Hard Case.
customer_reviews.text: It's very study, a little bit on the hard side to open. It's kind of difficult to fit the game cards in but they get very tight and secure once inside.
customer_reviews.author: Rubén Pulido

customer_reviews.title: Nice protective case that holds games securely
customer_reviews.text: Excellent game case. I was using a generic one that came with my Vita case, and my games wouldn't stay in the slots. This case holds my games securely, and the memory card holders are removable if you want to use the case for games only.
customer_reviews.author: CichlidFiend

customer_reviews.title: Durable case at a good price that holds a lot for its size
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these to store my Vita games and they are great. Very easy to load these up when I travel and have all of my games in one place. Haven't had any issues with the build quality or anything they have been great.

customer_reviews.title: No Blues Here...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to safely secure my memory cards and game cards. Speedy delivery as well. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: not bad for a carring case, got this for a few game on the go.
customer_reviews.author: borurygar

customer_reviews.title: This case is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This case is so easy to use! It doesn't require excessive force to store a game inside, nor feel like you might break your game trying to take it out. The fact you can remove the memory card clips inside the case means if you prefer game cartridges (like myself), you can carry more. The case itself doesn't feel cheap and is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: David Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. It holds all of my games in a nice compact form factor. It does the job and so far has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Vita Cartridge Case
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have is that in one game cartridge slot at the edge of the case, it is very hard to remove the game. Otherwise it is a very good case.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E.

customer_reviews.title: but I'm happy that it performs up to the Sony's standard
customer_reviews.text: Simple and gets the job done. Had to purchase this because they discontinued the Sony PS Vita Card Case, but I'm happy that it performs up to the Sony's standard.
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product to store ps vita games! and it fits perfect in many ps vita cases.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Corzantes

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product...very durable and does as it says it will. I love this case especially since songs is now $18.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sablad

customer_reviews.title: pretty nice!
customer_reviews.text: what can I say holds all the games I'd need for a trip and then some! doesn't feel too cheap. has latest me several transit rides.
customer_reviews.author: hryder77

customer_reviews.title: Good case, works great to keep Vita and PSTV ...
customer_reviews.text: Good case, works great to keep Vita and PSTV games and cards together.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very inexpensive solution to keep my games organized and portable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Case
customer_reviews.text: Good Case, Holds like every game even made for the system AND a few memory cards
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Skeith

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done but isn't the greatest way to hold my games and the plastic has ...
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done but isn't the greatest way to hold my games and the plastic has a really cheap feeling. I mean if so much a finger nail touches it, there are scratch marks.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool in person. Better than what I expected. Now my son has no excuse for misplaced games!
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Plastic tends to break
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this case for under a month, and already the small plastic bits which keep the game cards in place are starting to break apart whenever I remove a game. :/ It looks nice, and is thin, but I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: lc

customer_reviews.title: Thin and translucent
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. It fits in my purse and I dont have too many games that I travel with so this is just a convenient little package
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great little case!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little case. Its very small but holds alot of games and the price is well worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It allows to have many games whit less space. recommended to everyone. Portable and easy to carry . Really good product

customer_reviews.title: great prouduct
customer_reviews.text: i love this prouduct now i can put my vita memory card and games when i travel

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed, and cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to open, games and memory cards slide in and out easy, and you only need one.
customer_reviews.author: Effing Wewt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice case - just wish it were longer to contain more games.

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend it to anyone looking to store a few more ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what I expect it to....hold my games/memory cards. I'd recommend it to anyone looking to store a few more games and/or memory card for relatively cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kwarteng A

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: great product for the price, a bit flimsy when trying to close but well worth it for the gamer on the go as the size is perfect for any pocket.
customer_reviews.author: o.O

customer_reviews.title: ok but not very well made
customer_reviews.text: The case is mostly fine, the plastic just isn't very well machined and the cards don't fit in well. Would recommend spending a bit more for the official one.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for games and memory cards
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my games that I still had in original cases. And it also fit in my vita carry case.

customer_reviews.title: ... but the little memory card thing is a bit annoying because I try and just upgrade my card instead ...
customer_reviews.text: it works well but the little memory card thing is a bit annoying because I try and just upgrade my card instead of buying others

customer_reviews.title: Small, yet has room
customer_reviews.text: Holds up to 10 vita games. Size is small and can easily fit in your pocket or wherever you wish to carry it. Really good, definitely recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Great and cheap case!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for one of these to carry my memory cards everywhere without losing them. I recommended it to anyone!!!

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It works just like the description says. It's perfect because our current PS Vita case has the games flopping around in there, so when my 7 yr old opens it, often times games fall out. He doesn't usually notice it because of his age. The color we got was a deeper blue than what the picture shows. I actually like the color we got better!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: fast delivery and I thought it was only going to hold 5 games but it really holds 8 games and 4 memory cards

customer_reviews.text: I like to have the actual vita cases(collecting purposes) but this makes travel so much easier. Just started my vita adventure but already know this is an invaluable accessory to have on the go. Great size. I wish it was as bright of a blue as in the advertised pictures... but still a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Juston Silveira

customer_reviews.title: Its is one of few products that I have bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Its is one of few products that I have bought that is made by Nyko that actually works the way it should

customer_reviews.title: Nice Compact carry case
customer_reviews.text: This makes it easy for me to keep up with my extra memory card and a few games.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good case and for price i got for is great

customer_reviews.title: Protective and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I put this inside the carrying case I got for my Vita (CTA Digital PS Vita Travel Case). I didn't trust the travel case to keep everything safe, and it lacked a way to hold memory cards. This carrier fits just fine in the case and holds all my cards firmly while protecting them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pollastro

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Holds games very secure. My boy bring it everywhere never have to worry about his games getting lost. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Bones0404

customer_reviews.title: Game Case
customer_reviews.text: Its cheap and does indeed get the job done. But my only complaint is that the latch feels so cheap.

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured :(
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it's not the sme color as pictured...it's a really dark almost navy blue color :( The latch is cheaply made, but what do you expect from an inexpensive item!

customer_reviews.title: I like it, it is small and can hold 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it is small and can hold 8 games, if you travel you won't need more than that

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: is very comfortable to save your games and take care of dust travels water and anything else that might damage the game

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy plastic that keeps games well protected and secure
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Sturdy plastic that keeps games well protected and secure. Great product especially for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Definately a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me, that loves to switch between games on the go, this is a must buy. No more carrying tons of cases when you can have up to 10 games in a small package.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: guarda juegos
customer_reviews.text: is very comfortable to save your games and take care of dust travels water and anything else that might damage the game

customer_reviews.title: Worst case I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I was so very disappointed in this. Half of the spots won't accept the Vita games no matter how you press. The other half accept the game and it snaps in place, and the second you look sideways at the holder, they pop back out. Absolute waste of money, I set up the Amazon return within minutes of receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: LegoDadTop Contributor: Architecture

product_meta.title: Nyko Game Case for Vita - PlayStation Vita
product_meta.description: Easily pack and bring up to 10 PS Vita Game Cards with you wherever you go with Nyko's Game Case. The Game Case's extra small footprint in big on storage, but can easily fit in a pocket, back pack or hand bag with minimal effort. Each Game Card easily snaps into place and stays secure through bumps, walks, drops and more. In addition to carrying Game Cards, two special inserts, included with the Game Case, allow you to fit up to 4 PS Vita Memory Cards. The translucent case not only protects your games, but allows you to conveniently see each game in the case. The Game Case is the ideal case for the gamer on the go.
feature_bullets: Holds up to 10 PS Vita Game Cards
Removable Vita Memory Card slots – holds up to 4
Less than half the size of a retail game case
Ideal for travel and gaming on the go
Translucent case allows for easy viewing of Game Cards

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars239 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
